website_summaries.verdict: The Ryka Adel proved to be a comfortable and supportive walking shoe for many female wearers. It was highly praised for its fit, slip-on style, inexpensive price, arch support, and traction. On the downside, not everyone was a fan of the shoe’s design. But overall, a considerable number of buyers still found it to be a solid choice for everyday walking demands.
pros: The Ryka Adel received a myriad of praises for being a comfortable all-around walking shoe
The footwear offered a cozy fit with ample room in the toe box, according to most buyers
Many people lauded the fact that it was easy to slip on
The affordable price tag attracted a lot of purchasers
Some wearers appreciated the arch support provided by the shoe’s platform
Several ladies mentioned that the outsole delivered traction on wet surfaces
The shoe kept the foot warm during colder days, as stated by a few reviewers
cons: Some buyers did not find its design to be attractive
for them, it seemed bulky and made their foot look bigger
A couple of wearers complained about the heel slipping out of the shoe

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute & extremely comfortable. My plantar fasciitis feet are finally in shoe heaven!
customer_reviews.author: AleashaFaye

customer_reviews.title: Love them but they run big
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are very comfortable and do keep my feet dry. If I were to buy again, I'd go down half a size. I almost always wear a 9 and I think these would fit much better in an 8.5. Otherwise I wouldn't hesitate and plan on buying Ryka brand shoes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn Feller

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are very comfortable. If you need a shoe with a wide toe box but buying shoes in an overall W (wide) width doesn't work for you because you only need the toe area to have more room, these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wet days
customer_reviews.text: I never know what shoes to wear when it’s raining. These are perfect! I bought my typical size & they fit perfect. They are easy to slip on and provide traction & protection on wet days.
customer_reviews.author: Klherma

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for high arches
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box the feel good. Good arch support and light weight. Very seldom do I find a shoe that fit well.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: LIKE WEARING A PAIR OF SLIPPERS
customer_reviews.text: Ryka makes the greatest shoes for women. I have rarely had to return a pair for not fitting well. These shoes are terrific! I put them on as soon as they arrived and what a treat. Pure comfort, a good arch support and a large toe box. I highly recommend Ryka for an woman who has to do a lot of standing or walking or running. If you have a problem with shoes fitting properly these are the shoes to try. I now have about 10 pairs including some tennis shoes that I should dispose of but they still feel great.
customer_reviews.author: NEVER UGG AGAIN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except a bit on the unattractive side.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with all the other reviews concerning fit, comfort, quality and value of these sneakers. I ordered my normal size of 7M and the shoes fit perfectly. Great arch support. Lightweight. Price was phenomenal but personally, I think they are unattractive. I'm keeping them because Ryka knows women's feet, plus the dark olive color was less than $20.00! They shipped in Prime Time.
customer_reviews.author: MissKittyfromGA

customer_reviews.title: Ryka Adel  is Great slip on.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! My last pair of Ryka Slip on's I used with my knee replacement. Now I'm getting a hip replacement and needed a new pair. These are FABULOUS. I use a thin heel lift and my custom foot orthotics and they fit exactly. My heels fit low enough in the shoe as they should! Often by adding your own inserts it raises your heel up to much and you don't have the right grip from the back of your shoe on your heel. These Adel do not do that. The depth is good. Very pleased. Will buy another pair. My last pair were 9.5. this pair is 9 wide. The fit is true.
customer_reviews.author: Roger & Julia Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slip on sneaker
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ryka slip on sneakers and I have loved them! They are comfortable and supportive while being stylish.
customer_reviews.author: CAI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I have the blue and the black. Comfortable and a good walking shoe. I purchased a 7 1/2M and I slipped in my own vionic orthotic and they fit perfect with wiggle room for my toes. I would purchase another pair in a green color if they had them.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent "House"  or Casual Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Slips on effortlessly but offers arch support. Non-skid bottom ensures you won't slip on tile, laminate or wood flooring. They slip on comfortably on top of the arch without feeling tight pressure. I will always buy the Ryka Adel Walking Shoe for the house. Glad I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box and put them on. I have light socks on and an insert, but they are still a little loose and my heal comes out of the back slightly. I hope this will be better in the winter when I wear heavy socks. They squeak when I walk and they are not attractive, but they seem pretty supportive for a slip on and I need something for around the house, so I will keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I needed shoes for work (nurse) that I can slip on and off without touching them when the pandemic started. I have other Ryka shoes and love them. These did not disappoint. They fit perfectly, have good arch support, slip on/off easily so I can leave them in the garage when i get home from work. I have been using them for over 2 months now and they are hold ing up well.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Julian

customer_reviews.title: Just ok..
customer_reviews.text: A little to firm, not very cushie. The shoe is pretty stiff and not very flexible. The top is kind of pointy to a weird looking shape. But it does keep my foot supported for my over pronation and plantar fasciitis so I am in less pain so they will work for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: anne siska

customer_reviews.title: Weather resistant.
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka shoes! They are perfect for me because I walk heavy on my heels. That being said, this style does not have memory foam in the heel for me. It is a nice shoe and great for shopping in sloppy weather. I need a heel cup in this shoe for my specific needs. I will still buy Ryka, but I will research the heel structure in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Like the convenience of a slip on shoe, but...
customer_reviews.text: I received my 2nd pair of this shoe and it is comfortable and close to fitting. I normally wear a wider shoe so when I first ordered this shoe, I purchased my regular Ryka size (have several pair). I ended up returning that pair because they were like an extra wide. I purchased the 2nd pair in regular width and these are much better fitting. They are still "roomy" but will work for me. Not sure why the change in size after all this time.
customer_reviews.author: AL Lance

customer_reviews.title: SUPPORTIVE INSOLE
customer_reviews.text: Well made terrific insole but too big and bulky for me too Wide the Navy Blue pair were for my friends Daughter for her 11th Birthday and she loves them Great for Rainy Day's too since they repel water
customer_reviews.author: JANIE

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long time Ryka lover but don't love this shoe. I always wear a 9.5 W but they were way too big. Returned for a size 9, still a bit loose. I put my inserts on, which helped a bit. Kept the shoes since I really pool only wanted something to wear around the house that would be easy to put on and remove. Thet are HOT. I can't wear them long at all. And they aren't as easy to just slip on as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: S D.

customer_reviews.title: Style & Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! I was really excited to get this pair. And what I love even more is you can see there is an arch in the insole. Lots of cushion and very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and water repellent, good looking too!
customer_reviews.text: A classic style that since I purchased my first pair, four more have followed, so that now I have five pair. Needless to say, I wear them winter and summer. They look great with leggings, and I have even worn them with knit dresses! They feel like slippers, which my plantar fascia keeps me from wearing, so I wear them with socks in the winter and without socks in the summer. Love them, and they are flattering!
customer_reviews.author: wiseshopper61

customer_reviews.title: Size 7 1/2 fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Ryka always fits me well. I purchased them for half the price they are sold for thru QVC. The green is dark and rich looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad feet, great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! Bought 3 pair total. I have horrible feet...two surgeries on one and elected not to mess with the other one. Bottom line: bunions hammertoes and deformed toes overall. These shoes in a wide width are as comfortable or more comfortable than slippers. Hence the purchase of 3 pairs. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meem

customer_reviews.title: I had to get a 1/2 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes. Comfortable. Not super wide, considering that regular Rykas are already pretty wide. The run large. I usually wear an 8, but needed a 7.5 in these. They are NOT very water water resistant. I walked in wet grass for 5 minutes and my feet were very wet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Not spectacular and not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. I searched waterproof shoes and this came up...likely because one of the reviewers mentioned they were. They are not. My heels hurt when wearing the shoe so I will need to get a heel cup of some sort. Otherwise fairly easy to put on and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Comb Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Too bad..it seems that Ryka is no longer making this model. I hope they bring it back. This was my second purchase of this model. Great travel shoe. I wore them in Ireland and they kept my feet dry as they are water proof. I have trouble finding shoes that are comfortable and keep my feet from hurting. These were perfect and I was able to do a lot of walking comfortably. Great arch support. I originally bought them for my knee replacement recovery and they worked well. I was able to slip them on without having to bend. The rounded toe box is very comfortable and roomy. Bring it back RYKA! I will buy a bunch!!
customer_reviews.author: barelyseventy

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are too wide and slip.
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and color, but the size 7 M is too wide. they are not comfortable, so I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: victorjay

customer_reviews.title: SOO Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have bad achy feet, plantars and heel spurs and these shoes do not disappoint. In fact I bought another pair for myself and a pair for my mother. I am a teacher and am on my feet almost all day on tile floor and these shoes get me through the first 7 hours of my day with ease. I do recommend wearing socks for extra support. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE FOR FALL!!
customer_reviews.text: JUST RECEIVED THESE SHOES AND HAVE WORN THEM WENT INTO DAMP WEATHER. THE RAIN FALLS RIGHT OFF AND THAT IS WHY I PURCHASED THEM. FIT IS TRUE TO SIZE.WONDERFUL TO WEAR DOING ERRANDS IN DAMP AND SNOWY WEATHER HERE IN WISCONSIN!! I HAVE THE GREEN , BUT IS MORE BROWN. THE COLOR REPELS DIRT TOO.THE PRICE WAS WHY I BOUGHT THEM FAST!!! YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.author: grandma

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like these sneakers! I’ve been unsuccessful in my search for a comfy, sturdy, and good looking slip on sneaker — until these. I did purchase these in my true size and had to send back. So, order a half size smaller and you’ll save yourself some time and effort. I wear without socks and so far I have no complaints. Very good arch support and toes box is roomy. Easy on-off.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, warm, and dry feet!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite work shoe, but it is rarely available on Amazon or the Ryka site (in the color I want). I work in a retail store, and spend my day in and out of the freezers. My feet stay warm and dry in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than average arch support
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a simple design and are easy to slip into without bending over. They also have good arch support, which not all ryka shoes have. I normally wear a 7 but had to order a half size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: lonewolf

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not water-resistant at all!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and easy to slip on and off. However, I purchased them because they are meant to be water resistant but they are not at all. While walking in light rain (with an umbrella) on slightly wet grass the water soaked right through. Disappointing, because the shoe is kinda clunky looking so the water-resistant feature was the selling point for me and that didn’t work out. That being said, they are comfortable enough that I can wear them casually so I did not return them.
customer_reviews.author: JANEB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes to wear indoors. They serve this purpose with comfort for at least half the day. Normally I change shoes often so this is a good thing. Most people will find good support & comfort. Good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.now

customer_reviews.title: Very confortable
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I ordered this shoes. I ordered 6.5 and wide and they fit perfect. I wear size 7 but I read the reviews. The first day I wear this shoes I was standing for 13 hours and didn’t bothered at all. I recommend it. I just had it for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort - WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a shoe that wouldn't give me an excuse NOT to walk. This is it! I can slip them on in a jiffy and GO! Soft as my grand-babies blankets. No rubbing, no pinch, no pull. Seriously comfortable! Easy-on for a quick walk and back. Well worth the price - quality shoe that holds up to it's description in a world of shoes that don't.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P. Vogler

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: They are well made and color was nice. However too wide and not enough arch support for me. I’m disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Madureira

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Normally this much arch support isn't comfortable for me but I can wear these easily all day. Not crazy about the color. It's more of a olive green
customer_reviews.author: vikki

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with Ryka
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size, always comfortable. I buy a lot of Ryka shoes. This one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is well made and nice looking. In soles are removable and once I put in my own, arch support was better. Not sure I'd trust them for all day walking while on vacation, but for casual wear, A-OK. Nice roomy toe box.
customer_reviews.author: June Damanti

customer_reviews.title: My favorite work shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes because I am on my feet all day in retail, in and out of freezers. My feet stay comfortable, warm, and dry. Best work shoes ever!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that feels like a sneaker but doesn't look like one, and this is exactly it. Comfy, light, breathable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Ryka didn't let me down
customer_reviews.text: These are my new everyday shoes! Fit right out of the box - comfortable but structured, and water resistant. I'm not, but if you're fussy about color, it seems to change depending on the light.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten several shoes by Ryka and to me they run big. I wished I would have sent them back and ordered 1/2 size smaller. I love the shoe
customer_reviews.author: B. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get an easy on/off shoe that would give me good support for walking. These have been great. The arch support seemed a bit much at first, but I think it has been good for my feet. So comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brufam

customer_reviews.title: Ryka is great but runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: I like these, and they are comfortable. They are large. I wear a 10 and this 10 is too big/loose. Go for a half-size down in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: MW from FLA

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: No cushion what so ever. Hard as a brick does have arch support. I had to put a soft insole in the shoe, hopefully that works. Don’t feel like returning.
customer_reviews.author: Hart

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Used for touring in a cold climate. I had to replace the insole with an orthotic for plantar fasciitis but these were very comfortable for walking all over city streets. Kept my feet warm and dry as well
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hagerman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect casual slip-on
customer_reviews.text: As with all of my other Ryka shoes, this one fit perfectly. They look good, and I got them at a great price because I guess the color is not very popular. It was fine for me, since I use it as a good supportive shoe around the house and to run out to the store or the pool for water aerobics.
customer_reviews.author: njune

customer_reviews.title: Great Cruise  Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for an Alaskan cruise. Love the easy slip-on, very comfortable, washable,and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, roomy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy shoe! May not be the most stylish, but it got me through several days of lots of walking on vacation, which is worth five stars! I was in cold weather and paired with some wool socks, my feet were nice and toasty. Probably too warm except for cooler weather use.
customer_reviews.author: L. Paul

customer_reviews.title: A LITTLE BIG
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe - love this brand - but I should have sized down at least 1/2 size. Nice navy/blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Need arch support all my flip flops are all Vionic so when Vionic had these walking shoes no need to put inserts
customer_reviews.author: Cherie J. Katin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Long time Clarks wearer, but I love these for walking shoes. Comfortable out of the box and wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: R. Neverdahl

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, comfortable, but not quite as much cushioning as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe and will use it when I travel. Not the chicest but it does provide a cushioned arch and footbed, just doesn't seem quite as cushioned as a previous slip-on I purchased. Different model and it's been a few years so that one is no longer made. All in all and decent shoe. Glad it came in W.
customer_reviews.author: EBH

customer_reviews.title: Wide and comfortable for walking
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes when I walk my dog through my neighborhood. They are comfortable and didn't need to be "broken in". Good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and dry
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are very comfortable and I love not worrying about puddles. This brand does run small. I usually wear a 9, but I need a 9.5 in Ryka
customer_reviews.author: CATHYinHOUSTON

customer_reviews.title: Nice casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shape of sole made toe box too small for my feet. Upper material is very nicely pleated and is water resistant. Furry lining is thin but feels cozy. If they had fit my feet correctly I would have kept them.
customer_reviews.author: KC Hervey

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking around the house
customer_reviews.text: Helping my feet to feel much better after spending 6 months in bare feet as I work from home.
customer_reviews.author: twinkie22

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Slips on, stays on. Good traction on wet surfaces. Nice color. VERY comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JanetK

customer_reviews.title: They are so comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Easy to step into and great for a walk!!! I have 3 pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable with good toe room and snug heel.
customer_reviews.text: Have only worn them around the house a little but they are very comfortable. I have not worn them out in rainy weather which will be the test.
customer_reviews.author: Maraposa

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the way this shoe looks and the fact that it's water resistant. But if you take the insole out and feel inside the shoe, the sole is quite thin at the heel, no real cushion at all. This is causing heel pain for me and I won't be able to wear them. They also feel clunky and hard to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sue L

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting shoe of this type, and I've tried them all.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: Like these sneakers, I would get them for cooler months because they are nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Clark

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, wanted to love them but the medium width was WAY TOO WIDE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: Too small, had to send these back. Couldn’t even get the shoe on! I was so surprised because I always get size 11 in Ryka shoes. Also these shoes had a lot of paint and foam flaws which made me wonder if these were real Ryka shoes. I’ve always had good experiences with Ryka and I’m bummed these didn’t work out.
customer_reviews.author: Anet

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable, easy on.
customer_reviews.text: Slips on, stays on. Very comfortable right out of the box and water resistant, too!
customer_reviews.author: JanetK

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fit. I wear 8M and this fit with med or heavy weight socks. Wore for first time in Colorado and did a lot of hiking. They kept my feet warm and comfortable. I am ordering another color
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with good arch support.
customer_reviews.text: Love these-bought two pair. Very comfortable and good arch support. I bought my true size -they are a little big so will wear with socks. For the second pair i ordered them a half size smaller in a wide width.
customer_reviews.author: Deb O

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly and are very comfortable. Great walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: K.R. Shen

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and made very well
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I do a lot of walking and try to get 10000 steps a day. They are very comfortable and this is my second pair. I wish I had them in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Ryka are the best
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes I got them in 3 colors
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box. No break in needed. Light weight, fit to size.
customer_reviews.author: SCarey

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fills wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love these shoes feel great right out of the box . Bought one pair had to go back for another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Campana

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these a LOT. Great for walking the dog, running errands. Cute and comfortable. Would be 5 star but they are too warm for summer. First pair lasted a long time. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. Do wish it stated that it is more of a winter shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lia G

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything. Could have been better quality but price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a wide toe box
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run 1/2 size too big length but are narrow across the ball of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Tudor

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Substantial slip on casual shoe, purchased Wide width, super comfy for my wide foot
customer_reviews.author: Indianaamazonuser

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: This athletic shoe is comfortable and accurately Sized . Nice arch support and room in the toe. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow heel, but this size 9 medium width fits like a glove!! Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: mum

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are so cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M

customer_reviews.title: Love Ryka!
customer_reviews.text: A well-made shoe that’s very comfortable right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Your were able to remove insole and put in orthotic. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room with or without socks. No break in time. My go to everyday shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Whitaker

product_meta.title: Ryka Women's Adel Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: Cool, comfy, her new go-to. The anndel slip-on sneaker features a sporty upper and an ultra-cozy teddy bear lining perfect for cooler temps. Plus, the anatomical footbed with arch support gives her the made-for-women comfort she needs with every step.
feature_bullets: Lightweight outsole grade EVA features rubber in key areas to help prevent slipping on slick surfaces in the winter
